title: Enga Veetu Kuththu Vizhakku Lyrics Meyaadha Maan
stanzas:
<div>
Enga Veetu Kuththu Vilakku Lyrics Meyaadha Maan

Ethana piravigal eduththaalum
Unna thaedi varuven
en chellam odivaruven

Hand bag-a naan irundhaa
Un tholaye thonginirundhiruppen
Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhkaiye geththu.

Hand bag-a naan irundhaa
Un tholulaye thongiruppen (2)

Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu (2)

Ethana piravigal eduththaalum
Unna thaedi varuven
en chellam odivaruven(2)

tomu tomu tom tommu
sochellam soppula
Kappula paayaasam ..

Kammala naan irundhaa
Ayyayyoo.
Un kadhodave urasinirundhiruppen
Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhkaye geththu

Ye kammalaa naan irundhaa
Un kadhoram urasiruppen(2)

Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu (2)

Karchiefa naan irundhaa
Un kaikulla irundhiruppen

Heelsa naan irundhaa
Unna heighta thookki
Kaattirippen
Mass ne nee

Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu (2)

Teddy Bear-aa naan irundhaa
Unna kattipudichine
Thoogiruppen
Enga veettu kuthu vilakku
Nee kedachchaa vazhkaye gethu.

Ye teddy beara naan irundhaa
Unna katti pudichinu
Thongiruppen (2)

Enga veetu kuththu vilakku
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu
Nee kedacha en vazhka geththu.
category: Song:Enga Veetu Kuththu Vilakku - Meyaadha Maan
